title: Analysing Hitman GO: Incredible, Against All Odds

media:group.media:title: Analysing Hitman GO: Incredible, Against All Odds
media:group.media:description:

---

Hitman GO is a game that, on paper, shouldn't work. It takes a series known for the freedom of approach it offers players, and instead opts for the rigidity of a grid-based board game format... on mobile no less! And yet, against all odds, Hitman GO manages to capture almost every aspect of what makes Hitman the series it is todayâ€”a fact made all the more impressive given the context of its production and release. Let's talk about why you should take this overlooked gem seriously!
